subSubSection.paragraph: In typical male hybrids, Ch-Apo is boomerang-shaped, Pa-Fe club-shaped, but relatively thin, with four simple, equidistant ventral Pa-Fe spines in the frontal half, Pa-Ti without proximal dorso-medial hump.
